main event: A UFO was observed in Alexandria, Louisiana, on June 25, 1958, for approximately 3 minutes.
interesting points: The object changed color from red to green before disappearing., The object was compared in size to a strawberry or grapefruit., Observers noted luminous trailing sparks behind the object., The object moved from the northeast to northwest at a consistent angle., Both observers had credible backgrounds, one being a pilot and the other a school teacher.
sighted object: one round object emitting luminous sparks
witnesses: Lt. Clemis A. Bailey, a pilot, and a housewife from Alexandria.
